page.title: 16LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Richard writes that in his spare time his main interest is swimming.He trains three or four times a week and most weekends he goes to swimming galas.These are big get-togethers where various teams e.g Norwich swans, Norwich penguins,Kings Lynn gladiators and his own team Aylsham Vikings complete against each other.By belonging to the swimming Club he has made many friends from other parts of Norfolk .His dad,Douglas Poyuton,is the chief coach. Besides swimming he enjoyes Bicycle Motor Cross _B.M.X.This is a very thrilling sport with two sections- racing and freestyle.The racing means the riders ride their bikes as fast as they can round a specially made track with bumps and jumps.Freestyle is a contest of tricks where the rider uses bike to jump or ride on his back wheel
